==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|じゅ|ふ|yomi=on}}

===Etymology===
Possibly from {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=しゅふ'}} compound {{m|ltc|呪符|tr=*jiuk? *bhio|lit=oath, curse, incantation” + “tag, charm}}. Alternately, coined in Japanese from {{etyl|zhx|ja|sort=しゅふ'}} elements.

===Pronunciation===
* {{l|ja|sc=Latn|音読み|On'yomi}}
* {{ja-accent-common|a|じゅ|ふ}}<ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref>
* {{IPA|lang=ja|[d͡ʑʲɯᵝɸɯᵝ]}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|じゅふ}}

# an [[amulet]] or [[charm]] to [[ward]] off [[illness]] or other [[misfortune]]
# a [[magic]] [[charm]]
